content:
What a great idea! I'd be happy to help you with that! Here is the list of all the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) movies in chronological order:

**Phase 1:**

1. Captain America: The First Avenger (set during World War II)
2. The Incredible Hulk (set in 2005)
3. Iron Man (set in 2009)
4. Iron Man 2 (set in 2010)
5. Thor (set in 2011)
6. The Avengers (set in 2012)

**Phase 2:**

1. Iron Man 3 (set in 2012-2013)
2. Thor: The Dark World (set in 2013)
3. Captain America: The Winter Soldier (set in 2014)
4. Guardians of the Galaxy (set in 2014)
5. Avengers: Age of Ultron (set in 2015)
6. Ant-Man (set in 2015)

**Phase 3:**

1. Captain America: Civil War (set in 2016)
2. Doctor Strange (set in 2016-2017)
3. Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 (set in 2017)
4. Spider-Man: Homecoming (set in 2017)
5. Thor: Ragnarok (set in 2017)
6. Black Panther (set in 2017)
7. Avengers: Infinity War (set in 2017-2018)
8. Ant-Man and the Wasp (set in 2018)
9. Avengers: Endgame (set in 2023)
10. Spider-Man: Far From Home (set in 2023)

**Phase 4:**

1. Black Widow (set in 2023, between the events of Captain America: Civil War and Avengers: Infinity War)
2. Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings (set in 2023)
3. Eternals (set in 2023)
4. Spider-Man: No Way Home (set in 2023)
5. Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness (set in 2023)
6. Thor: Love and Thunder (set in 2023)
7. Black Panther: Wakanda Forever (set in 2023)
8. The Marvels (set in 2023)
9. Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 (set in 2023)

Note: This list only includes the feature films and does not include the Marvel One-Shots, short films, or TV shows that are part of the MCU.

Enjoy your Marvel movie marathon!
